function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Safety concerns with reusable masks and shields due to lack of medical testing and airtightness","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough safety and airtightness testing, using high-quality materials, and providing clear usage guidelines","Technologies":"Advanced testing equipment, airtightness measurement devices, and high-quality materials","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals using the masks and shields","Owner":"Manufacturers, health organizations, and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Potential incorrect translation and prolonged translation time with speech-transcribing face masks","Impact":"Miscommunication and language barriers in healthcare and public settings","Mitigation":"Improving translation software accuracy and speed, offering training for effective use, and providing alternative communication methods","Technologies":"Advanced translation software, real-time language processing, and training programs","People":"Multilingual individuals, healthcare workers, and individuals in global settings","Owner":"Technology companies, healthcare organizations, and language specialists"},{"Description":"Noise and size concerns with personal air-purifying shields","Impact":"Discomfort, distraction, and potential reluctance to use the shields","Mitigation":"Reducing noise levels, minimizing shield size, and providing user education on proper use","Technologies":"Sound-proofing materials, compact air purifying technology, and user-friendly design","People":"Individuals in crowded or noisy environments, healthcare workers, and individuals with sensory sensitivities","Owner":"Manufacturers, safety organizations, and user experience experts"}]}
